system.description: Effect: Can only be used if you have at least 1 Stockpile stack. You spend all your Stockpile stacks to attack. Spit Up's Power is 100 times the number of Stockpile stacks spent.

actions.name: Spit Up
actions.description: Effect: Can only be used if you have at least 1 Stockpile stack. You spend all your Stockpile stacks to attack. Spit Up's Power is 100 times the number of Stockpile stacks spent.
